amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease by $20.7 million, the Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFI) account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 254 (Roll no. 358).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Duffy amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 254 (Roll no. 358).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Duffy.
